bwapi

Class AbstractPoint<T extends AbstractPoint>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bwapi.AbstractPoint<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CenteredObject, Position, PositionedObject, TilePosition, WalkPosition

    public abstract class AbstractPoint<T extends AbstractPoint>
extends java.lang.Object
    Common ancestor for location based objects to simplify distance computation. This will be refactored into interface with default methods when java 8 becomes widely used. Idea by Rafa³ Poniatowski
